article:
This article present possible problems and their solution.
For example:
Warning in line 8: {W136} Relative URIs are not permitted in RDF: specifically Warning in line 8: {W102} Unqualified property attributes are not allowed. Property treated as a relative URI.
Apache Jena does not support relative URIs, you should design them as absolute. For example, rather than:
<Ontology xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#" xml:base="http://www.semanticweb.org/scdsahv/ontologies/2022/5/untitled-ontology-5" xmlns:rdf="http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#" xmlns:xml="http://www.w3.org/XML/1998/namespace" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#" xmlns:rdfs="http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#" ontologyIRI="http://www.semanticweb.org/scdsahv/ontologies/2022/5/untitled-ontology-5"> <Prefix name="" IRI="http://www.semanticweb.org/scdsahv/ontologies/2022/5/untitled-ontology-5"/> ... <Declaration> <Class IRI="#DescriptedElement"/> </Declaration> ... </Ontology>
You should have:
<Ontology xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#" xml:base="http://www.semanticweb.org/ontologies/untitled-ontology-5" xmlns:rdf="http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#" xmlns:xml="http://www.w3.org/XML/1998/namespace" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#" xmlns:rdfs="http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#" ontologyIRI="http://www.semanticweb.org/ontologies/untitled-ontology-5"> <Prefix name="" IRI="http://www.semanticweb.org/ontologies/untitled-ontology-5"/> ... <Declaration> <Class IRI="http://www.semanticweb.org/ontologies/untitled-ontology-5#DescriptedElement"/> </Declaration> ... </Ontology>
